data.title: PDF Master
data.description: Get fast insights to research papers or any PDF file content. Easily upload and ask Chat Smith to analyze, summarize, or even translate anything you want.

data.description: Optimize your time by asking Chat Smith to give you key points or answers to any questions about your favorite Youtube videos within a click.

data.title: GPT-4 Vision
data.description: Unlock the future of AI and elevate your chat experience with GPT-4 Vision feature, which enables precise analysis, object recognition, and scene understanding in visual content.
